short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Build no-code onboarding experiences on top of your product.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gist offers live chat, email marketing automation, event tracking, knowledge base, help desk, and more... all-in-one.

With this extension, you can select elements such as buttons, input fields in your web app to trigger tours.
